name: Summer Goals
body:
Goals for the Summer:

* To gain experience in web development, including learning some JavaScript
* To practice working on projects that serve a greater purpose, instead of mere assignments, and see how these projects are coordinated in a real-world environment.
* To see what it's like to hold a job in a computer science related field
* To check out what other projects people are carrying out at Serre Lab
* To gain a better idea of what machine learning is all about
* To (hopefully) make a significant contribution to the project we will be working on by the end of the summer
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
